Interface SocialService

All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface SocialService

This defines the contract with the rest of the world

chrisburrell

Method Detail

addProgramme

Programme addProgramme(Programme p)
Adds a programme to the data store

Parameters:
p - the programme to be added. Throws an error if Id is specified.
Returns:
the new programme

updateProgramme

Programme updateProgramme(Programme p)
updates the programme with the new version provided in parameter 'p'

Parameters:
p - the updated version of the programme
Returns:
the updated programme

deleteProgramme

boolean deleteProgramme(Long id)
Deletes a programme from the data store

Parameters:
id - the id of the programme to be deleted
Returns:
true if successfully deleted

findById

Programme findById(Long id)
Finds a programme by id

Parameters:
id - the id of the programme
Returns:
the Programme that matches the specified input Id

findByAvailability

ProgrammeList findByAvailability(boolean availability)
Finds all programme with a particular availability

Parameters:
availability - the availability of the programme
Returns:
a list of all available programmes

findByCategory

ProgrammeList findByCategory(ProgrammeCategory category)
Finds all programmes that are in a particular category

Parameters:
category - the category to be filtered by
Returns:
a list of all available programmes

findByCategoryAndAvailability

ProgrammeList findByCategoryAndAvailability(boolean availability,
                                            ProgrammeCategory category)
A search both by availability and category

Parameters:
availability - true if we want programmes that are currently available
category - the specific category to filter on
Returns:
a list of programmes
